fields.name: abilities:
fields.value: - during the day shoot someone. if you kill your own faction you die. 3 charges (added by duwiiton)

fields.name: attributes:
fields.value:
- Dies on Day 5, listing the cause as every single SK role that GIM has (added by spaggy)
- This role is treated as a town role for all purposes except goal (added by luka)

fields.name: goal:
fields.value: Send at least 1500 messages in day chats over the course of the game without getting banned for spamming (added by nubslair)
